mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT deviceIp) FROM metoo_mac WHERE tag = 'E' AND mac != '00:00:00:00:00:00'
mapper.update: update metoo_mac set tag='AE' where deviceIp in ( select deviceIp from ( select deviceIp ,count(1) as cnt from ( select deviceIp,port from metoo_mac WHERE mac != '00:00:00:00:00:00' AND tag = 'E' group by deviceIp,port ) a group by deviceIp ) b where b.cnt=1 ) AND mac != '00:00:00:00:00:00' AND tag = 'E'

UPDATE metoo_mac as org join ( SELECT d.deviceIp,d.`port`,d.remoteDevice from ( select a.deviceIp,a.`port`,a.cnt1,b.cnt2 from (select deviceIp,port,count(1) as cnt1 from metoo_mac where tag ='E' group by deviceIp,port)a inner join ( select deviceIp,port,remoteDevice, count(1) as cnt2 from metoo_mac where tag ='E' group by deviceIp,port ,remoteDevice) b on a.deviceIp=b.deviceIp and a.port= b.port and a.cnt1=b.cnt2 ) c inner join metoo_mac d on d.tag ='E' and c.deviceIp=d.deviceIp and c.`port`=d.`port` ) as dest on dest.deviceIp=org.deviceIp and dest.port=org.port and dest.remoteDevice=org.remoteDevice set tag='DE'

UPDATE metoo_mac as org join ( SELECT d.deviceIp,d.remoteDevice from metoo_mac d where tag ='DE' ) as dest on dest.deviceIp=org.remoteDevice and dest.remoteDevice=org.deviceIp set org.tag='DE',org.remoteDevice=dest.deviceIp,org.deviceIp=dest.remoteDevice where org.tag ='AE'

UPDATE metoo_mac AS a INNER JOIN metoo_mac AS b ON a.deviceIp = b.remoteDevice AND a.remoteDevice = b.deviceIp SET a.tag = 'DE', b.tag = 'DE' WHERE a.tag = 'E' AND b.tag = 'E' AND a.deviceIp != a.remoteDevice AND a.deviceIp IN ( SELECT deviceIp FROM ( SELECT deviceIp FROM metoo_mac WHERE tag = 'E' GROUP BY deviceIp) t )
